name: Sugar
text: On Play: Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active. On K.O.: If your opponent has 6 or more DON!! cards on their field, play up to 1 {Donquixote Pirates} type Character card with a cost of 5 or less from your hand.
